subject: Real Estate
title: Canada's Housing Obsession
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Canada's Housing Obsession.

hook.text: The average Toronto home costs $1.1 million. The average Toronto household income is $85,000. How?

buildup.text: Canada's housing market has been called the most overvalued among G7 nations for over a decade.

discovery.text: Foreign investment, low interest rates, and immigration drove prices to levels that defy local incomes.

twist.text: Canada banned foreign buyers in 2023 â€” the first G7 nation to do so. Prices barely budged.

climax.text: When housing becomes a national investment vehicle, no single policy can bring prices back to earth.

punchline.text: Canada's ban on foreign buyers changed headlines, not prices.

quiz.question: What unprecedented step did Canada take in 2023?
